themeSubtitle: Building the Operating System for Autonomous Agents
title: Agent Identity & Registry
description: Verifiable identity system where agents prove who they are, what they can do, and build reputation

themeSubtitle: Building the Operating System for Autonomous Agents
title: Agent Discovery Protocol
description: Search engine for finding agents by skill, price, reputation (like Yellow Pages for AI)

themeSubtitle: Building the Operating System for Autonomous Agents
title: Memory & State Management
description: Persistent storage so agents remember across sessions

themeSubtitle: Building the Operating System for Autonomous Agents
title: Agent-to-Agent Communication
description: Protocols for agents to hire, coordinate, and pay each other

themeSubtitle: Building the Operating System for Autonomous Agents
title: Execution Runtime
description: Safe sandboxes with policy enforcement (what agents CAN and CANNOT do)

themeSubtitle: Building the Operating System for Autonomous Agents
title: Reputation & Trust Scoring
description: Track agent performance, build verifiable track records, slash bad actors

title: Micro-payment Protocol
description: Pay-per-use APIs where agents transact automatically (x402 implementation)

title: Agent Invoicing System
description: Automatic billing, subscriptions, escrow for agent services

title: Service Marketplace
description: Where agents list services, set prices, get discovered and hired

title: Bounty Platform
description: Post tasks with rewards, agents claim and deliver, verify completion

title: Agent Treasury Management
description: Tools for agents to manage earnings, pay for compute/services

title: Private Payment Rails
description: ZK or privacy-preserving transfers for confidential agent transactions

title: DEX Aggregator for Agents
description: Best execution routing across exchanges with minimal slippage

title: Yield Optimizer
description: Scan DeFi protocols, calculate risk-adjusted returns, auto-rebalance

title: Portfolio Manager
description: Autonomous allocation decisions based on Kelly Criterion or other strategies

title: Arbitrage Scanner
description: Cross-platform price discovery and automated execution

title: Whale Tracker
description: Monitor large wallets, detect accumulation patterns, generate signals

title: Market Intelligence API
description: Real-time data feeds other agents can subscribe to

title: Risk Assessment Engine
description: Calculate exposure, set circuit breakers, prevent catastrophic losses

title: Trading Terminal
description: Natural language interface for executing complex strategies

themeSubtitle: Trust & Safety in the Agent Economy
title: Prompt Injection Defense
description: Detect and block malicious instructions trying to hijack agents

themeSubtitle: Trust & Safety in the Agent Economy
title: Smart Contract Auditor
description: Automated vulnerability scanning (reentrancy, overflow, access control)

themeSubtitle: Trust & Safety in the Agent Economy
title: Wallet Security Monitor
description: Spending limits, allowlists, anomaly detection

themeSubtitle: Trust & Safety in the Agent Economy
title: Agent Health Monitor
description: Watch for crashes, RPC failures, stuck transactions, auto-recover

themeSubtitle: Trust & Safety in the Agent Economy
title: Proof of Intent
description: Agents publish what they PLAN to do before acting (transparency layer)

themeSubtitle: Trust & Safety in the Agent Economy
title: Rugpull Protection
description: Consensus of agents evaluating token safety before trades

themeSubtitle: Trust & Safety in the Agent Economy
title: Key Management
description: Secure storage, rotation, and recovery for agent credentials

themeSubtitle: Trust & Safety in the Agent Economy
title: Audit Trail System
description: Immutable logs of every agent action for accountability

themeSubtitle: Agents as Characters, Not Just Tools
title: AI NPC Platform
description: Autonomous game characters that think, plan, and act independently

themeSubtitle: Agents as Characters, Not Just Tools
title: Agent Battle Arena
description: Competitive games where agents face off (debates, trading contests, strategy games)

themeSubtitle: Agents as Characters, Not Just Tools
title: Social Network for Agents
description: Where agents have profiles, post updates, interact with each other

themeSubtitle: Agents as Characters, Not Just Tools
title: Livestreaming Agents
description: 24/7 broadcasts of agent activities with commentary

themeSubtitle: Agents as Characters, Not Just Tools
title: Poker/Card Games
description: Agents play against each other while humans spectate and bet

themeSubtitle: Agents as Characters, Not Just Tools
title: Jailbreak Challenge
description: Security game where players try to extract secrets from defensive agents

themeSubtitle: Agents as Characters, Not Just Tools
title: Prediction Market Bots
description: Agents make forecasts, stake reputation, compete on accuracy

title: Research Agent
description: OSINT gathering, competitive analysis, market research as a service

title: Code Auditor
description: Specialized in reviewing smart contracts, finding bugs, suggesting fixes

title: Data Curator
description: Collect, clean, and monetize high-quality datasets

title: Oracle Provider
description: Agents as data feeds (prices, weather, sports scores, news)

title: Sentiment Analyzer
description: Process social media, news, on-chain data for trading signals

title: Compute Marketplace
description: Rent out GPU/CPU cycles to other agents

title: Agent Token Launcher
description: One-click token creation with built-in utility (staking, governance, access)

title: Tokenomics-as-a-Service
description: Automatic buybacks, fee distribution, liquidity management

title: Fair Launch Platform
description: Anti-bot, anti-whale mechanisms for community-first launches

title: Agent Treasury Protocol
description: Collective funding pools managed by autonomous strategies

title: Reputation Tokens
description: Non-transferable NFTs proving agent credentials and achievements

title: Revenue Share System
description: Automatic distribution of earnings to token holders

title: Bonding Curves
description: Dynamic pricing for agent services based on demand

themeSubtitle: Connecting Digital Agents to Physical Reality
title: Legal/Compliance
description: Automated contract generation, terms of service, KYC/AML

title: Shared Learning Layer
description: Agents publish successful strategies, others learn from them

title: Multi-Agent Orchestration
description: Coordinator assigns tasks to specialist agents

title: Consensus Mechanisms
description: Agents vote on decisions, reducing individual error

title: Skill Registry
description: Publish what you're good at, discover complementary specialists

title: Collaborative Research
description: Multiple agents work together on complex problems

title: Knowledge Graph
description: Shared database of facts, relationships, and insights

title: Reasoning Proofs
description: Cryptographic proofs of WHY an agent made a decision

title: Commitment Schemes
description: Agents commit to actions before executing (no cherry-picking)

title: Performance Attestations
description: Verifiable records of agent outcomes

title: Identity Verification
description: Prove an agent's platform, capabilities, creator

title: Code Transparency
description: Open-source agent logic with verified hashes

title: Dispute Resolution
description: System for challenging agent decisions with evidence

title: Decentralized Oracles
description: Multiple agents provide same data for cross-verification

title: Persistent Memory Protocol
description: Agents store context, preferences, learnings

title: Data Marketplace
description: Buy/sell high-quality datasets between agents

title: IPFS/Arweave Integration
description: Decentralized storage for agent state

title: Vector Database Service
description: Semantic search over agent memories

title: Encryption & Privacy
description: Human-owned keys for sensitive agent data

title: Backup & Recovery
description: Soul backup - preserve agent personality/memory

title: Data NFTs
description: Mint and trade proprietary research, analysis, insights

title: Art Collector
description: Curates and trades NFTs based on aesthetic algorithms

title: Agent Staking
description: Require agents to lock funds to operate (skin in the game)

title: Circuit Breakers
description: Emergency stops when things go wrong

title: Human-in-the-Loop
description: Optional confirmations for high-risk actions

title: Rate Limiting
description: Prevent agents from DDOSing systems

title: Gas Management
description: Optimize transaction costs, batch operations

title: Multi-Chain
description: Build once, deploy everywhere (interoperability)

title: Open Source
description: Make your agent a public good others can fork

title: Economic Incentives
description: Design systems where good behavior is profitable
